programme.title: Heartland

programme.title: Heartland

programme.title: Heartland

programme.title: The Island with Bear Grylls
programme.desc: "Episode 3" - At starvation point Barnes decides to risk strong currents and rip tides on a raft journey to a nearby island in the hope of finding food. Both camps are resolved to live apart but driven by desperation Barnes invites his neighbours on the raft expedition. Mercedes, already struggling with hunger and exhaustion is unable to help around camp placing her relationship with her teammates on a knife-edge. Her shock decision to join Barnes' fated voyage ends with disastrous consequences.

In 1969, Perry performed the first public same-sex wedding in the U.S. setting the stage for a lifetime of activism of behalf of the LGBT+ community.

programme.desc: "Prescription for Change" - Melissa Riobe's life is ruled by her addiction to drugs. Now, the 42-year-old woman has learned how to buy powerful prescription drugs online without a doctor's note.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Burning Questions" - Recent college grad Robert Terrible is out drinking at a club with friends celebrating. At 3am, he realizes he better call it a night and heads to the nearby garage where he parked his car.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "A Fatal Attraction" - It's an early Sunday morning when a local resident decides to take a short-cut through the church parking lot. Walking past a lone car, the resident can't believe his eyes.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "The Things Men Do" - It is 3am and Deputy Torres is cruising a Texas highway when he suddenly spots a crushed pick-up truck along the side of the road. Trapped inside is the lifeless body of 24-year-old Luis Reyes.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Truth of the Matter" - Carol Moleskie agrees to go on a hunting excursion with her husband, Bob. A few hours after they enter the woods, they emerge again, Bob frantically waving down traffic as he carries his bloody wife.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, off-duty Maine State Trooper Vicky Gardner is attacked by Steven Fortin during a routine stop.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When 19-year-old Lori Auker left her Pennsylvania home for work and never arrived, it took space-age technology, cat hairs and insects to pinpoint the image of the woman's abductor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Forensic computer analysis, blood spatter analysis and a painstaking investigation lead police to a lawyer husband Michael "Mick" Fletcher with a motive to kill his wife.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Lisa Manderach and her daughter Devon left their Pennsylvania home to go shopping, but didn't return home.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1996, police received a call from Darlie Routier telling them of her two sons' murders. The police found the killer by analyzing blood spatter, doing behavioral profiling and analyzing Darlie's 911 call.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: On a windy Kansas night in 1995, a mysterious fire swept through the home of a prominent doctor. In the debris, investigators found evidence which told them how the fire started.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Sometime during a neighborhood Christmas party, five-year-old Melissa Brannen disappeared. Investigators turned to forensic science to help them see what the witnesses missed.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: The doctors at the hospital couldn't determine the cause of Bobby Curley's hallucinations and intense pain. They treated it as a neurological disorder but his condition deteriorated. He was being poisoned.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Who was the sexual offender who murdered two adolescent boys in Nebraska? The key to stopping him would be the unique composition of the "junk rope" he used to tie his victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Janice Johnson was found dead at the foot of her basement stairs. Police in Nova Scotia had to unravel the circumstances surrounding Janice's death and answer the question: Was it an accident or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: In 1996, more than a dozen children in Seattle, Washington, were fighting for their lives. Each one of them had contracted a serious unknown illness. After one died, investigators knew the clock was ticking.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Fire engulfs the home where Lori Keidel and her siblings were left alone while their father went to the laundromat. Years after her mother's disappearance, Lori tells police she witnessed her mother's death.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 4
programme.desc: Young Navajos in the Southwest were dying at an alarming rate. The tribe's medicine men provided investigators with a critical clue that would lead halfway around the world to a most unlikely killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: Women in a Louisiana city live in fear of a rapist who leaves no clues to his identity. But technology and behavioral science combine to give police a new forensic tool. Police narrow their search to one man: local policeman Randy Comeaux.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: When the wife of a well-known dentist is found dead, police struggle to identify a suspect. Some fibers and a study of the weather patterns on the night of the murder break the case open and reveal the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: When Joann Katrinak is found dead in a corn field with her infant son, the obvious suspect is the husband and father of the victims. But insects found on the bodies reveal a vital clue which uncovers a twisted story of passion gone wrong.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: When a policeman's house goes up in flames, experts suspect arson. The officer whose home was torched arrests low-level drug dealer James Wren, who confesses. But when the suspect vanishes, investigators question the authenticity of the confession.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 5
programme.desc: Nancy Newman and her two daughters are found brutally murdered. The crime scene has no shortage of evidence, but investigators cannot find a conclusive link to their prime suspect. To solve the puzzle, an FBI analyst designs a unique experiment.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: "Contestants get acquainted with their teammates while a series of difficult decisions has an immediate impact on the competition. The glass breaking challenge provides an early test of grit and determination. Hosted by Tom Abbott and Stephanie Sparks from the IBEROSTAR Playa Paraiso Golf and Spa Resort."

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: "Teams faceoff in Blackjack as tensions begin to rise and a players confidence begins to dwindle. Hosted by Tom Abbott and Stephanie Sparks from the IBEROSTAR Playa Paraiso Golf and Spa Resort."

programme.title: Swing Expedition with Chris Como
programme.desc: "Chris travels to Dallas National Golf Club and spends a day with multiple-time PGA Tour winner Bryson DeChambeau and his long-time coach, Mike Schy. Bryson explains the origin of his single-length clubs and the mechanics he learned at a young age."

programme.title: Swing Expedition with Chris Como
programme.desc: "A journey to explore golf's leading teachers, players and influencers. Chris Como travels to Denver and learns how Bryson DeChambeau builds muscle and maintains strength before, during, and in between tournaments."

programme.title: School Of Golf (Instructional)
programme.desc: "Instructor Martin Hall provides tips and drills utilizing an in-studio golf simulator. Martin Hall and Blair O'Neal share how to start the 2020 golf season off hot. Martin reveals how a hockey stick can simplify one of the most misunderstood terms in golf, and shares advice straight from Tiger Woods about how to return to the game and avoid rusty play. Also, a unique lesson on why golfers and football players competing in the Super Bowl should both be trying to find the end zone."

programme.title: School Of Golf (Instructional)
programme.desc: "Instructor Martin Hall provides tips and drills utilizing an in-studio golf simulator. Jim Saric, and pro guides Gregg Thomas and Tony Grant use a combination of casting and trolling techniques to battle the high waters of Cave Run Lake in Kentucky.

programme.title: Behind The Season ALASKA "Oh the Irony"
programme.desc: Episode 4 – It’s Day 6 on the Big Meadow for Mark and Tyler when their luck finally changes. With a 10+ foot bear spotted, they rush to get into position before nightfall

programme.title: Storytellers S1:E1 "The Hill"
programme.desc: This is the story of how FE Hill ranch got it's start. From its inception, FE Hill has created opportunities for people to experience the outdoors and create memories. For us, it has created a tradition of Fathers and Sons hunting together.

programme.title: TRP S4:E44 - DJ Laz , Bruce Marx and Eric Martinez - Stolen Boats and GPS and Engines in South Florida
programme.desc: LIVE from the Ft Lauderdale International Boat Show with Miami LEGEND DJ Laz. Laz recounts a story for the ages as his boat gets stolen in South Florida and ends up in Mexico. Laz goes to Mexico to recover and finds more than he bargained for. Human trafficking and a whole ring of stolen boats were uncovered. Bruce Marx, a Miami Attorney, also recounts a story of having his electronics stolen and the campaign he has been waging to encourage Electronics companies to use passcodes and other theft prevention ideas. He has created a community of boaters in South Florida concerned about preventing theft and works with Law Enforcement agencies to stop theft or recover vessels. Eric Martinez has a product called LocMarine which monitors vessel status, bilge pump activity, shore power, battery, high water alarm, backup power alert, GPS location and a Geo Fence Alarm among other features.. Together we discuss boat theft, what owners can do about it and ideas for prevention. Visit LocMarine at http://www.locmarine.com/podcast and get one year of complimentary service and a $50 rebate with purchase. Just mention The Tom Rowland Podcast when you make your purchase for the rebate.

programme.title: The Bearded Buck S4:E1 "Texas Aoudad"

Through his daughter Krissy and the Jose Wejebe Memorial Foundation, many individuals have had their fishing dreams come true. This year at the 2020 Fish For Jose Event and Auction, Jack's putting up a day of fishing with the Two Conchs crew as a prize, in an effort to pass along the Spanish Fly spirit that Jose was so well known for.

Finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Julia how to make foolproof Blueberry Cornbread with Honey Butter.

programme.title: The Italian American Kitchen

And finally, test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison how to make a spectacular Fluffy Baked Polenta with Red Sauce.

programme.title: Holiday Roast and Potatoes
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison streamline a classic recipe for Boneless Rib Roast with Yorkshire Pudding and Jus. programme.title: Tex-Mex Favorites
programme.desc: Hosts Julia Collin Davison and Bridget Lancaster make a Lone Star State classic-Flank Steak in Adobo. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his top pick for inexpensive blenders. And finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Julia how to make the ultimate Texas Breakfast Tacos.

programme.title: Refreshing Desserts

Finally, test cook Tim Chin shows host Julia Collin Davison how to make perfect Lemon Posset with Berries.

programme.title: Grown Up Comfort Classics

Finally, gadget critic Lisa McManus reviews lid holders.

Marja and her friends, food experts Diana and Jennifer, enjoy bulgogi in Seoul and then Marja eats it again in Andong, the spiritual capital of Korea, at a restaurant that produces thousands of ceramic jars of deonjang, a soybean paste that flavors much of Korean cooking.

programme.desc: Lucky Chow highlights the food world’s newest rockstars: farmers who grow the food that ends up on our plates.

programme.title: Lucky Chow
programme.desc: Lucky Chow discovers the culinary delights found in Asian houses of worship across America.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: Kolkata, the first stop of Pablo's journey and the gastronomical capital of India. Pablo explores the streets, local markets and meets a lot of exciting people who give him a taste of the regions cuisine.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: The Monpa Tribe are the corn farmers who reside in this small, beautiful village of Dirang. The mountain slopes and the corn harvest remind Pablo of his home and the comfort food warm his soul.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: Pablo steps foot in one of the most remote parts of the Arunachal Pradesh, the Lubrang Valley, which shelters the Brokpa Tribe and their yaks from the very unpredictable weather.

programme.title: Gourmet Goes Tribal
programme.desc: Tawang is synonymous with Buddhism with its magnificent monastery set among the Himalayas. Paul's journey takes him to meet with monks, pay respects at a centuries-old stupa and cook with nuns.

programme.title: Into the Outback with Abbey Holmes
programme.desc: Arriving in Darwin, Abbey hits the ground running thirsty, and keen to find the coldest beer in the territory, goes on a pub crawl by helicopter. Feeling like a refreshing swim, she jumps into the Cage of Death, sharing the pool with a massive saltwater croc.

programme.title: Into the Outback with Abbey Holmes
programme.desc: In the rugged plains of the Top End, Abbey joins good friend Matt Wright. They fend off an extremely feisty female croc, Sweet Thing. Abbey also meets some of his best mates along the journey, who just so happen to be about 17 foot long.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - India Part 3
programme.desc: In tonight's final programme Gordon heads south to the coasts of Kerala for the ultimate seafood curry. In Tamil Nadu he hits a meat-free zone and faces his biggest culinary nightmare, living in an ashram where the only food on the menu is vegetarian. Any tranquillity soon evaporates when Gordon tries his highest-octane sport yet - bullock racing - before his final stop in the slums of Mumbai. There he cooks on Slumdog Millionaire streets before putting himself to the ultimate test, cooking alongside one of India's top chefs for a star-studded dinner at the Taj Hotel.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - Vietnam
programme.desc: Gordon touches down in Vietnam - he's never been here before but this nation are fearless foodies if it moves they eat it and every bit of it! On Gordon's travels he is wowed by legendary local restaurateur Mrs Duck who turns out to be the queen of beak to tail cooking, he loses his bottle when a 6 foot long snake complete with beating heart is served-up for dinner and finishes his week trying to impress Vietnam's pickiest foodies when he takes over a traditional restaurant and has his own Kitchen Nightmare.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay’s Great Escape - Cambodia
programme.desc: Gordon is going off the beaten track to Cambodia. After the years of Khmer Rouge rule and civil war the country was at year zero. Today the country is in recovery and the food is undergoing a revival. Gordon scours the country hunting out historic recipes that pre-date the Khmer Rouge rule. He hires a chopper to take him into the heart of the jungle where he discovers a dessert fit for a restaurant, he turns hunter gatherer wading through snake infested rivers on the hunt for a Cambodian favourite, frog and is on the trail of Cambodia's hairiest delicacy, tarantula!

programme.title: Kyle Supley's Out There - NY Classics!

programme.desc: Kyle's friend Douglas Calhoun, creator of the Queer Interior website, visits Kyle's apartment and collection.

programme.desc: Kyle visits his good friend, ragtime barber, Michael Haar's apartment in Queens to see his vintage phonograph and barber shop collection, and a get a new 'do.

programme.title: Journy World Docs - Easter Island: Mysteries of a Lost World
programme.desc: The contrast between the majestic statues of Easter Island and the desolation of their surroundings is stark. For decades, Easter Island has been seen as a warning for the planet as a whole: exhaust natural resources and the collapse of civilisation is inevitable. But Dr Jago Cooper believes that this is a disastrous misreading of what happened on Easter Island. Far from being a failure, the culture was a success story - and the real reasons for its demise were not the actions of its people.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Sade & Aaron Kira & Damien
programme.desc: Sade and Aaron are too busy to plan their own wedding, while Kira and Damien have all the time in the world. But Gino wows Sade with an elegant rooftop wedding, while giving Kira and Damien the beach ceremony they dreamed of.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Cassaundra & Joko Katie & Tim
programme.desc: Cassaundra & Joko want to marry at the Top of the Rock, but their guest list is too large & Gino needs to find an alternative. Katie & Tim want a church wedding, but Gino convinces them that Times Square would be more their style.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Abigail & David Meritza & Kyle
programme.desc: Gino marries stylish couple Meritza & Kyle on a runway during a fashion show. Abigail & David have never been to NYC, but dream about being married there, and Gino scores them a location in the iconic Grand Central Station.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Andre & Joy Belinda & Jerry
programme.desc: Two weddings showcase Central Park & the site of the 1964 World's Fair. But there's plenty of drama, including a hungover groom, a bus breakdown, missing bridesmaids, and an ominous approaching storm.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Alison & Skip Linda & Curtis
programme.desc: In Washington Square Park, Gino marries a bride who was married to a woman to a man. An Asian-American bride defies her parents and marries her African-American husband in a checkered taxi.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Melissa & Jerry, Lisa & Ross
programme.desc: For New Yorkers Melissa and Jerry, Gino secures a picturesque wedding location under the Brooklyn Bridge. Ross is a bachelor and Lisa's a fourth time bride, but their rooftop wedding is a perfect fit.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Sade & Aaron Kira & Damien
programme.desc: Sade and Aaron are too busy to plan their own wedding, while Kira and Damien have all the time in the world. But Gino wows Sade with an elegant rooftop wedding, while giving Kira and Damien the beach ceremony they dreamed of.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Cassaundra & Joko Katie & Tim
programme.desc: Cassaundra & Joko want to marry at the Top of the Rock, but their guest list is too large & Gino needs to find an alternative. Katie & Tim want a church wedding, but Gino convinces them that Times Square would be more their style.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Abigail & David Meritza & Kyle
programme.desc: Gino marries stylish couple Meritza & Kyle on a runway during a fashion show. Abigail & David have never been to NYC, but dream about being married there, and Gino scores them a location in the iconic Grand Central Station.

programme.title: Marry Me In NYC: Andre & Joy Belinda & Jerry
programme.desc: Two weddings showcase Central Park & the site of the 1964 World's Fair. But there's plenty of drama, including a hungover groom, a bus breakdown, missing bridesmaids, and an ominous approaching storm.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Out with a Bang!
programme.desc: The girls make their way to St. Louis for their farewell Mary Mary concert and tensions continue to grow between the two & Tina is MIA. Tina & Mitchell meet to discuss her solo project.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Life's a Mitch
programme.desc: Sisterly rivalry sets in when Erica is up for several Dove Awards. Meanwhile, Mitchell causes an uproar when he crashes Goo Goo's photo shoot, tries to get her fired & confronts Erica and Warryn.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Hail Mary
programme.desc: Erica and Tina both go after their solo projects full force, but Tina has an epic meltdown moments before her big solo show - only Teddy can help because Erica is on tour. Warryn gets an ominous call from Sony.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Catch-Up with Mary Mary
programme.desc: Over the past three years, you've watched Mary Mary go through some of their highest highs and lowest lows. Catch up on all the fun and fiery drama and get a sneak peak of the craziest season yet.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Solo Sisters
programme.desc: Erica finds out how difficult a solo career can be without a manager & the Mary Mary budget. Tina stirs things up with Warryn and her record label by planning her solo project completely on her own.

programme.title: Mary Mary: A Tale of Two Tinas
programme.desc: While Erica is touring and unavailable for her sister, a frustrated "New" Tina tries to keep the "Old" Tina at bay while planning her wedding and meeting Teddy's estranged father for the very first time.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Hitched and Mitch'd
programme.desc: Tina & Teddy renew their vows in a stunning sunset ceremony. Teddy and daughter Laiah sing Tina's new songs. Mitchell confronts Erica at the wedding, infuriating Goo and Warryn.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Mary Mary Together Again
programme.desc: Erica desperately needs a vacation, so when Warryn cancels their getaway for a work trip in NYC, things get heated. But the real fireworks begin when Tina tells Erica it's time get Mary Mary back together.

programme.title: Mary Mary: I'm Gonna Kill Somebody!
programme.desc: Tina's confession on the radio about Teddy's infidelities leaves Erica panicked that her sister is hurting the Mary Mary brand. Tina's mess-up costs Warryn money, and Erica nearly collapses from exhaustion.

programme.title: Mary Mary: Twisted Sisters
programme.desc: Erica is forced to go to an event alone because Tina won't go. When Tina refuses to do Erica a favor, lines are drawn. Warryn pushes Erica to quit Mary Mary.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Eight" - The four remaining chefs are given fifteen minutes and a tray of leftovers to create a meal that Chef Ramsay considers servable.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Nine" - Chef Ramsay orders the three remaining contestants to serve an entire dining room. Who will create the best dish, and who will be sent home without their just desserts?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 1, Day Ten" - In the season finale, the final two — with some help from the eliminated chefs — compete in a simulation that tests their abilities to run a restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day One" - Twelve chefs begin their journeys for the final prize: an executive chef position at the newly opened Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Two" - After a disastrous opening night, both teams learn the hard way about the importance of restaurant service — by waiting on tables.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Three" - Frustrated after another lackluster dinner service, Chef Ramsay shares some of his experiences running a successful restaurant while setting the third night's competition.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Four" - Chef Ramsay ends the battle of the sexes, and "Hell's Kitchen" breaks new ground when the teams cook for an especially demanding group: children.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Five" - The fifth day commences with Chef Ramsay giving a lesson in the art of culinary flavor to the remaining contestants.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Six" - The six remaining chefs prepare original dishes, and the two teams devise their own menus for the night's dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 2, Day Seven " - The budding chefs must work as individuals for the first time. The prize for this challenge is a trip with Chef Ramsay to the Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sabatiello's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Sabatiello's and finds a hot-headed owner who is deep in debt. The owner gets so angry at his employees and Ramsay's criticism that he shuts down the eatery himself.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Black Pearl
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Black Pearl, a seafood restaurant that has three owners, each running the kitchen in a different manner. This leads to a confused staff and variable quality in food.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Mojito's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Mojito's, a Cuban eatery in Brooklyn. The owners purchased the restaurant as newlyweds, but they are now seven years into a crumbling marriage and business.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: PJ's Steakhouse
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits PJ's Steakhouse, a restaurant that is dying due to management's lack of control and poor food quality.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Revisited: Gordon Returns
programme.desc: When Chef Ramsay returns to Finn McCool's, The Olde Stone Mill, The Mixing Bowl, Dillon's, Campania's and Peter's, he finds restaurants saved from the brink of disaster.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Handlebar
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Mount Sinai, New York to help spruce up Bill and Carolyn LeRoy's Handlebar restaurant and lounge, which looks like it's stuck in the 1980s.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Giuseppe's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay makes his way to Macomb Township, Michigan to inspect Giuseppe's, a family-run Italian restaurant afflicted with a bickering father-son duo and a shortage of customers.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Trobiano's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay tries to help Italian restaurant Trobiano's. When Ramsay confronts the owner about the cleanliness of the kitchen and the tastiness of the food, tensions rise.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Black Pearl
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Black Pearl, a seafood restaurant that has three owners, each running the kitchen in a different manner. This leads to a confused staff and variable quality in food.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Welcome To The Future" - In celebration of Marie Claire's 20th anniversary, the designers are asked to make a look that could be worn twenty years in the future in the magazine. The catch? They have to look to the past...20 years to be exact, for inspiration.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "A Suitable Twist" - After a field trip to Red Robin, the designers are challenged to take an all-American staple, a men's suit, and transform it into a high fashion women's look. The suits they are given are from all different fashion eras, and the winner of the last challenge is asked to choose for the rest of the competitors.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Klum of Doom" - Heidi asks the designers to create a red carpet look that she could wear to the Creative Arts Emmys. When Heidi is less than pleased in the workroom, she tells most of the designers to start over. On the Runway, two designers are eliminated.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Rock The Wedding" - For the second Team Challenge of the season, the designers work in pairs to create looks that could be worn for a "nontraditional wedding." They must design one look for the ceremony, and one for the reception. Dita Von Teese introduces the challenge and serves as guest judge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Priceless Runway" - With the help of Chopard, the designers are asked to create an extravagant eveningwear piece inspired by jewelry of their choosing. They also draw inspiration from the Charles James exhibit at the MET, and Tim decides to use his "Tim Gunn Save" on one designer.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Rainway" - Inspired by the latest Samsung Curved TV, the designers are asked to create avant-garde pieces that look good from every angle. The twist? The pieces also have to walk the Runway...in the rain! The designers have two days to put together a look that can wow the judges and withstand a "Rainway."

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "American Girl Doll" - After a field trip to the American Girl Store, the designers are asked to create a modern look for a young girl, inspired by the "Beforever" American Doll collection. The designers work with young girls as their models for this challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Muse On The Street" - For the Mary Kay Challenge, the designers are asked to find a complete stranger on the street to act as their muse (and model) for a makeover. The real women are given a makeup consult, new haircut, and new outfit. One designer runs into trouble with a zipper before the Runway, which leads to a controversial decision.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Highest Bidder" - The designers are taken to a large warehouse and told that for their next challenge, they will have to bid on storage units in order to obtain their materials. The designers work in teams of two to make a two-piece cohesive collection from the materials they buy. On the second day of their two-day challenge, Tim presents the designers with the task of designing one more look. When the judges cannot decide who to eliminate on the Runway, two designers face off in a one-hour showdown.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Fashion Week: Who's In and Who's Out " - The designers are asked to create a "Street Chic" look inspired by a trip around NYC, courtesy of Lexus. They are also thrown a twist...to redesign one of the "losing looks" this season, and their sewing helper is a previously eliminated designer.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Finale Part 1" - Fashion week is just around the corner, but not before the final four designers are surprised with a trip to Rome, courtesy of Best Western. The designers join Tim in a trip of a lifetime, where they gain inspiration for their collections. Later, Tim visits each of the designers at home to check on their progress. The designers then return to NYC and present a preview of their collection to the judges.

programme.title: Agua en la Boca
programme.desc: Es una historia de amor prohibido entre dos jóvenes, hijos de familias rivales. La hermosa Danielle Cassoulet (de descendencia francés) y el aventurero Luca Bellini (de descendencia italiana). El conflicto entre el cassoulet y la familia Bellini es viejo, siendo antes los mejores amigos de la juventud las matriarcas de esas familias hoy no pueden permanecer de pie debido a una disputa amorosa en el pasado en el que Françoise Cassoulet, y la abuela de Dany se peleaban por el amor de un mismo hombre.

programme.title: El Mono
programme.desc: A dos medio hermanas la vida les dará un giro radical luego de evento dramático.

programme.title: El Talisman
programme.desc: Tras perder un rancho en Texas, Camila Nájera y su familia se mudan a Fresno, California. El destino los llevará a ser vecinos del despiadado Gregorio Negrete, dueño del rancho "El Alcatraz". Gregorio ha vivido en guerra con Los Aceves, antiguos dueños de "El Talismán", y su único sueño es poseer ese rancho. Camila se verá envuelta en este juego de ambición y poder, que la lleva a conocer a dos hombres que le cambiarán la vida.

programme.title: El Show de Willi
programme.desc: Willi estrena su propio reality show. Todo el mundo está en vilo y pronto se revelará su verdadera intención.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar es un drama épico ambientado en el siglo XVI que relata la historia sobre un matrimonio político de conveniencia entre un emperador mogol, Akbar y una princesa Rajput, Jodha Bai. La trama se centra en cómo éste matrimonio político trae el amor entre ellos en una medida que cambió el destino de la India, así mismo retrata las guerras de ese tiempo junto con las relaciones entre los mogoles y los Rajputs. Gran parte de la historia recrea el funcionamiento de las instituciones icónicas de la época como las reinas, los tribunales, las cortesanas, los ministros y su influencia en la historia de amor de Akbar y Jodha Bai. La serie también destaca cómo el Emperador Mogol Jalaluddin adquiere el título de Akbar del pueblo.

programme.title: Agua en la Boca
programme.desc: Es una historia de amor prohibido entre dos jóvenes, hijos de familias rivales. programme.title: Santo contra el cerebro del mal

programme.title: La Violetera
programme.desc: Soledad, Una Violetera Madrileña, Conoce A Fernando, Un Joven Aristócrata Que Se Enamora Perdidamente De Ella. Al Morir Su Hermano, Fernando Ha De Hacerse Cargo De Las Obligaciones De La Familia Y Renunciar Al Amor De Soledad Para Casarse Con La Novia Que Iba Destinada A Su Hermano, En Pro De Los Intereses Familiares. Pasados Los Anos Soledad Se Ha Convertido En Una Famosa Cantante Y Fernando Ha Obtenido Una Brillante Carrera Politica

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Rich Little Rich Kid" - While paying a parking ticket, Ann meets a rich young man (Sam Melville) who invests in the theater and tries to seduce her, much to the chagrin of Donald.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Help Wanted" - When Donald's secretary goes on maternal leave, Judy Bessemer suggests hiring Ann as a substitute.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Little Auction Annie" - Ann's acquisition of a box full of various items at an auction draws the attention of a mysterious stranger (Michael Conrad) who has a strong interest in one of its contents.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Time for Arrest" - Ann is found in jail in a cave-girl outfit, after replacing her neighbor and fellow actress Margie (Jackie Joseph) on a side job that turns out to be a catering job for a Mafia boss.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Break a Leg" - A friend of Ann's named Sandy Stafford (Sally Kellerman) lands a role in a Broadway show and asks Ann to be her understudy. While Sandy is staying with her, she comes down with the measles.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "What's in a Name?" - Ann's attempt to adopt a stage name based on a suggestion from her agent is met with disapproval from her parents. The recycled version of the original pilot episode.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Soap Gets in Your Eyes" - Ann's role as a villainess in a soap opera compromises a potential relationship with Don's mother (Mabel Albertson). Will a visit from the actor playing the hero improve her image?

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "All About Ann" - Donald works with one of the actresses in Ann's workshop to do an article about her, but she thinks he's having an affair.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Phantom of the Horse Opera" - Ann's apartment building is being "haunted" by an old movie theater organist (Sterling Holloway).

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Beware of Actors Bearing Gifts" - A member of Ann's acting workshop tries to buy her friendship.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Christmas and the Hard-Luck Kid" - Ann tells Donald about her stint as a teacher in a boarding school, trying to bring good tidings and joy to a boy who won't be able to go home for Christmas.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Among My Souvenirs" - While sifting through boxes of souvenirs, Ann finds a ring given to her by a high school sweetheart and attempts to return it.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "These Boots Weren't Made for Walking" - Ann tries her luck as a traveling door-to-door saleswoman selling shoes. What her boss (Paul Lynde) doesn't tell her is that the shoes are made entirely from cardboard.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Kimono My House" - When Ann finds out how messy Don's apartment is, she hires a maid to help him clean the place up.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Gone with the Breeze" - Donald hands Ann the manuscript for a novel he wrote, which she is suddenly convinced she lost.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Rain, Snow and Rice" - At the Bauman's wedding in Connecticut, a snowstorm traps Ann, Don and their friends at the hotel, but only two rooms are available and Ann has no intention of sharing a bed with Donald.

programme.title: That Girl
programme.desc: "Paper Hats and Everything" - While Ann expects a dinner date with her father to be a surprise birthday party, Judy assembles one on short notice just in case it isn't.

programme.title: Jason Love - Jokes On Me
programme.desc: One of today's busiest comics, Jason Love has appeared on HBO, Comedy Central, America's Got Talent, and over 20 national broadcasts.Jason works clean and incorporates music, making him a favorite for companies like Google, Chevron, Farmers, and Costco.Says L.A. Weekly: "Jason Love is comedy that brings people together."From the Hollywood Improv to Carolines on Broadway, Jasons audience continues to grow. He has performed overseas for the troops and on the seas for cruise lines. Jason was a finalist at the Cabo Comedy Festival and at the World Series of Comedy in Vegas.Jasons non-profit, Love &amp Laughter, brings free shows to cancer support communities and others in need. His podcast is produced by Levity Entertainment. He is represented by Don Casino Productions.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Eric O Shea - Life: It's Not Your Fault
programme.desc: Eric O'Shea has been active in the comedy business for 25 years. He has performed in L.A. with Betty White at the Creative Emmy Awards and has appeared on America's Got Talent TV Show. Every year since 1997, Eric has performed an average of 70 shows a year, and has received 7 nominations as the “National College Comedian of the Year”

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Shayne Smith - Prison for Wizards
programme.desc: Former Gang Member, current comedian, future famous comedian. Shayne Smith is the runner up in the Wiseguys’ 2015 Funniest Person In Utah competition, winner of the 2015 Salt City Comedy Superstar contest and most recently voted best Alternative Comedian of 2016 by City Weekly.

programme.title: Moody Molavi - Remove Before Flight
programme.desc: The christian comic is married to his high school sweetheart, who later became his stepsister through the marriage of their parents to each other. That’s where the fun begins as Moody skillfully shares his life experiences.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Mark Christopher Lawrence - Clean Outta Compton
programme.desc: Mark Christopher Lawrence (born May 22, 1964) is an American character actor, stand-up comedian, and voice-over artist. He is perhaps best known for his role as esoteric D.J., Tone Deaf, in the 1994 satirical rap mockumentary, Fear of a Black Hat. He has co-starred in popular films such as Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Planet of the Apes, Lost Treasure and The Pursuit of Happiness. Lawrence can currently be seen in his regular role as Big Mike on the NBC series Chuck. He has made guest appearances on many television programs, most notably Heroes, My Name Is Earl, Crossing Jordan, Dharma & Greg, Malcolm in the Middle, Touched by an Angel, Malcolm & Eddie, Men Behaving Badly, Seinfeld, Murphy Brown, and Martin. He is also featured on the Radio Series Adventures in Odyssey as "Ed Washington".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Josh Sneed - Live in the Dessert
programme.desc: Hailing from the great city of Cincinnati, Ohio, Josh comes to Dry Bar to bring “new life” to his comedy. Being funny 24/7 can be difficult, but Josh Sneed does it. Watch “Live in the Dessert” by Josh Sneed now!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Steve Soelberg - Pirate Hymns
programme.desc: Steve Soelberg might actually be a human ray of sunshine. Riffing on his ultra-conservative upbringing, this special balances jokes about the tune of church hymns with hilarious observations of the seemingly mundane.

programme.title: Brian Moote - Getting Schooled
programme.desc: Brian Moote started performing stand up in 2005 while he was working as a teacher in the Seattle School District. He then went to graduate school to get a masters degree in social work because who doesn't love crippling debt? I mean, this is America. After graduating he moved to LA and now tours the country telling jokes. He has made TV appearances on the USA Network's "Characters Welcome," Nickelodeon's "Nickmom's Nite Out," MTV's "Money from Strangers" and AXS TV's "Gotham Live." You should come out and see him tell jokes... DO IT!!!

programme.title: Brad Upton - Will Be Funny For Money
programme.desc: Brad Upton first stepped on stage in September of 1984 and he's never looked back. This ex-grade school teacher is now in his 30th year of comedy and is nearing 6000 lifetime performances. He is a past winner of the Las Vegas Comedy Festival and appeared recently at Caesar's Palace as part of the HBO Comedy Festival. He has spent the last eight years as the opening act for the legendary Johnny Mathis and did multiple shows all over the country with the late, great Joan Rivers. He has also been seen in concert with The Smothers Brothers, Smokey Robinson, Kenny Rogers, Dolly Parton, Lewis Black, George Jones, Glen Campbell, Pam Tillis and many others. Coast to coast all over North America isn't the only place Brad performs. In 2014 Brad headlined in Singapore, Hong Kong, The MGM in Macau and did eight nights in Israel as part of the Comedy for Koby benefit. His new CD entitled, "Brad Uptonogood" is heard regularly on Sirius Satellite Radio and is available online wherever music is sold. He also just released his first DVD entitled, "Brad Upton, Live from the 509".

programme.title: Ty Barnett - Yep
programme.desc: Ty Barnett, a Chicago native, got his start at Seattle’s Comedy Underground. Whoopi Goldberg called Ty “hilarious” and reviewers have said he is “thought provoking” and “edgy”. All this praise earned him many television appearances. He hosted the Food Network’s Mealin’ and Dealin’, Discovery Family’s Babies Behaving Badly and Beasts Behaving Badly, and appeared in over 15 national commercials. It all began when he was one of the two finalists on the most-watched and Emmy nominated season of Last Comic Standing. Ty went on to multiple Tonight Show appearances where Jay Leno called Ty “one of the funniest comedians working”. He also appeared in HBO’s Bad Boys of Comedy, his own Comedy Central Presents and one-hour special Issues. Ty was named “one to watch” by the Hollywood Reporter. He’s also been seen on the sitcoms Samantha Who, Til Death, Life in Pieces, NickMom Night Out and Tosh.O. His comedy album, Grown Man-Baby Steps is a favorite on Sirius XM.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Sid Davis - Baggage Claim
programme.desc: This former airline worker hilariously unloads side-splitting baggage on stage. Sid's humor is fueled with A.D.D., a wavering ego, and a grade school teacher wife who views him as a child left behind.

programme.title: Daniel Eachus - A Mild and Skinny Guy
programme.desc: Daniel Eachus talks about weird jobs, strange fears, and how to prank restaurants all through the lens of being the lifelong skinny guy.

programme.desc: Comedian Maher Matta has been performing stand-up comedy for nearly sixteen years.

programme.title: Don Barnhart: The Spinal Disintegration of Man
programme.desc: Barnhart's comedy show is a thrill ride of well-written, topical material exploring modern day society.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Litter Monster
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this educational short about the best way to handle litter, sacrificing it to the all powerful Litter Monster. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they pay tribute to The Litter Monster.

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Kiss Of The Tarantula
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this twisted classic horror movie where a beautiful spider-loving mortician's daughter unleashes tarantula-filled revenge on all who wrong her! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (former stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 aka MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Paper and I
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this educational short all about a little boy and his talking paper bag. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they fly off to the forests of the American South for Paper and I!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX PRESENTS - Warning From Space
programme.desc: A group of giant one-eyed alien starfish come to Tokyo to warn the citizens of a rogue planet that is on a collision course with Earth! Join Matthew J. Elliott and Ian Potter as they receive a hilarious Warning From Space!

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: Harry the Dirty Dog
programme.desc: The stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 bring their comedic riffing treatment to this short about a dirty dog that really doesn't want a bath. Join Bridget and Mary Jo for Harry The Dirty Dog!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Curse Of Bigfoot
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this "so bad it's still bad" movie where they discover papier-mâché Bigfoot! Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for Curse Of Bigfoot!

programme.title: RiffTrax Shorts: Social Acceptability
programme.desc: The stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 bring their comedic riffing treatment to this short about how to be accepted by your peers. Join Bridget and Mary Jo for Social Acceptability!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Frankenstein Island
programme.desc: RiffTrax, the guys who make movies funny, bring their comedic riffing treatment to this cheesy 80's horror classic! When four baloonists crash land on a remote island, one thing is for sure: they have a dog named Melvin! Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they take a trip to Frankenstein Island!

programme.title: The Golden Castle - Episode 106
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie "Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle" he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: "The Golden Castle." While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for "The Golden Castle" and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a "script." The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight...Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends Of The Jungle - Episode 6
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement - Episode 107
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something...one of the Magic Books! It's "The Book of Deception." They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment - Episode 7
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter - and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win "The Blade Cup" where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight - Episode 108
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The "fake" knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black - The BLACK KNIGHT - appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find...young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island - Episode 8
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate - but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness - Episode 109
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap...is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: "The Book of Destruction." With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel - Episode 9
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression - but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon - but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic - Episode 110
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful "Book of Revenge!" Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege...will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

programme.title: Back To School - Episode 201
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro - in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way - they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go "back to school" to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much "fish out of water" at the academy, even with the "cool kids" - Robin and Ava - showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as "library helpers" much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a book...isn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: Getting The Message - Episode 11
programme.desc: As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? More twisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! The Friends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into a frantic race against time when Emma discovers that her innocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- a text that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma's undying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma's BFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angry brute and worse - the boys locker room!

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Greed Is Good? - Episode 202
programme.desc: When Jestro uses the Book of Greed to rob Auremville of its riches, he also gets Lance's parents as prisoners and these demanding rich folks are too much for even monsters to handle. Jestro's not sure what to do with his new castle in the Lava Lands. "Every castle needs a big chamber filled with treasure" says the Book of Monsters so they've got to go out looting! The BOM convinces Jestro to call forth GENERAL MAGMAR, and Jestro appoints him as "general manager" of "castle operations," much to Magmar's dismay. Meanwhile, Jestro and the BOM find the BOOK OF GREED. This will allow them to make greedy, rapacious monsters that will bring them all the treasure they want to fill their castle! They'll head to the richest town in the realm - AUREMVILLE! Meanwhile, in Auremville, the NEXO-Knights arrive for a huge "Gold is Good" ball at Lance's house. When the Monsters finally arrive in Auremville, a battle breaks out and the greedy monsters make off with everything...including Lance's parents, Goldie and Cuthbert Richmond who are clad in the finest golden garments and so look valuable! Lance will now be forced to live...poor. The Knights have to get his parents back. Meanwhile, his parents - Cuthbert and Goldie Richmond -think their imprisonment in Jestro's gold-filled castle is a "spa holiday" with the worst service. They order Magmar and the monsters around like servants and drive them all crazy. The Knights pile into the Fortrex and head for the Lava Lands, formulating a plan along the way to free Lance's parents. In a village half-way to Jestro's Castle, the Knights run into...Jestro and his monsters headed the other way with Lance's parents and all the gold they've stolen. There's a big fight, until they realize they might have the same goal and decide to deal. The BOM wants to give them back all the gold and Lance's parents. Lance says "No deal." "We'll take the gold, you can keep my parents." It's a weird and comical stand-off. Finally, Clay convinces Lance he has to take his parents back even if they don't always get along (and, it's the only way to get the gold back.)

programme.title: Darkness Shall Rise
programme.desc: Just as the rebuilding effort in Ninjago begins, the four ninjas come to realize that evil has started to resurface with Lord Garmadon forging the ninjas' lost Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers. With the Devourer destroyed, Ninjago is saved and the rebuilding effort begins. Without their Golden Weapons, the Ninja are stripped of their elemental powers. And with their flying ship 'The Destiny's Bounty' destroyed, the Ninja are forced to find a new home in the city. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon resurfaces and gains control of the Serpentine as well as transforms the Bounty's wreckage to become 'The Black Bounty'. The Ninja will battle Scales and discover evil has begun to resurface in Ninjago, while Lord Garmadon will successfully forge the Golden Weapons into a Mega-Weapon with unspeakable powers.

programme.title: The Book Of Obsession - Episode 203
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the "Knight-a-Kon" in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever "infiltration" mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro, the BOM and their monsters fit right in at the convention and Clay and crew have their work cut out for them trying to separate fiend from fan. Macy keeps going on-and-on about the story in the King's comic book as the Knights keep a watchful eye on it. Robin even shows up in the "Minitrex" - a small version of the Fortrex he built just for the Knight-a-Kon. He's convinced he can win the costume competition that is the big closing event for the Kon. At the end of the Kon there's a big awards ceremony for "Best Costume." The prize: "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1." The BOM must get it and scheme to get closer to it during the costume contest. He's just...about...to get the book when...the impatient Magmar attacks! Everyone thinks it's part of the big show! "Ned Knightly, Knight of Knighton, Issue #1" is tossed from person-to-person-to-person in the melee. The Knights must do something, but they're too far away from the Fortrex to download any NEXO-Power. Robin pulls up in his Minitrex they can use it to get NEXO-Power! Robin wins the best costume for his Minitrex and wins the Ned Knightly Comic which he then gives to Macy...she deserves to read it.

programme.title: The Drooling Detective - Episode 13
programme.desc: When ruthless dognappers steal Mia's dog Toffee from the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show, it's up to the Friends to play detective and track down the culprits, with the help of an unlikely hero: Stephanie's borrowed sad-sack bloodhound, Benchley. Andrea and her singing dog act, the Howlers, are a sure bet to win the Heartlake City Dog Talent Show - in spite of stiff competition from Tanya's dancing poodle, Olivia's Robo-Dog, and even Stephanie's sad-sack borrowed bloodhound, Benchley. But when an unscrupulous mother-and-son dog-napping team steals the Howlers' best singer, Mia's dog Toffee, it's up to the Friends to rescue him and catch the baddies with the help of the Hero Of The Day - Benchley!

programme.title: Pirates Vs. Ninja
programme.desc: When Garmadon by accident brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty - the ruthless Captain Soto and his Pirates - it is up to our ninjas to stop them from plundering Ninjago City. Sharing a tiny, one-bedroom apartment in the city, the Ninja take Lloyd to Grand Sensei Darreth's Mojo Dojo to begin training. There, they discover Lloyd has all four of their natural elemental abilities. Meanwhile, Lord Garmadon discovers his Mega-Weapon can't destroy, only create what the user wishes. By accident, Garmadon brings to life the original owners of the Black Bounty: Captain Soto and his Pirates, and they mutiny the ship. Answering the age-old question of who would win a fight between pirates and ninja, it's up to our ninja to stop Captain Soto and his men from plundering Ninjago City. In the end, Ninjago City is saved, the Pirates are arrested and Lord Garmadon escapes once again with their Black Bounty.

programme.desc: The people in Paris are lost! The city has been hit by a time bug! / The Statue of Liberty's head has been replaced by a giant clowns head! Who could have committed such an evil deed?

programme.title: Tiny Square Critters: Olrik Owl / Buller Bear / Edna Squirrel
programme.desc: Olrik Owl once said something silly 6 years ago. Nowadays Olrik doesn't feel at all wise compared to the others, who seem to know a lot. But his friends don't care. They just want to play. / Buller Bear has decided that he is old enough to sleep overnight in the forest all by himself. But a few things go wrong and he ends up having a row with Lulu Lynx. Earnest passes by and in the end, Buller has to break a tree to prove how strong he is. / Edna Squirrel and her friends want to go on an outing. But Edna forgets to tell her friends what exactly they will be doing and when they meet up they find that they have packed for 3 different sorts of outings.

programme.title: Hippothesis: Animal Habitat / Pulleys / Burrowing
programme.desc: Cathy-Judy's new nest is so appealing that Dawn decides to build one fit for a hippo! / Dawn's arms get tired when she tries to hold aloft a flag in celebration of Edward's birthday. / Dawn learns that living in an oversized burrow is not the best home for a hippo.

programme.desc: A monster movie is being filmed in Adventure Bay. Envious Humdinger tries to draw the production to Foggy Bottom by commandeering the mechanical monster. But he can't control the fireball breathing ro

programme.title: Zou: Zou's Scarecrow
programme.desc: Zou and his Dad are doing some gardening when birds eat the vegetable seeds they were planting. Grandpa suggests making a scarecrow – which actually turns out to be pretty effective, scaring several m

programme.title: Alphablocks: Little Red N / Odd
programme.desc: Im the Little Red N, the Alphablock said, Who will help me bake this bread? This episode has fun with the words dog, dig, cat, cut, pig, pick, mill, mix, hot and ten. / O goes through the magnifying glass to where the trees are square, the grass is blue and nonsense words make friendly monsters. This episode introduces nonsense words.

programme.title: Chloe's Closet: Crowing Up
programme.desc: When Chloe, Carrot, and Jet are left in charge of a vegetable garden they have to keep a flock of troublesome birds from eating all the vegetables!

programme.title: Chloe's Closet: On Frozen Pond
programme.desc: Chloe and friends help out a couple of penguins who are playing a very strange game of football!

programme.title: Willa's Wild Life: Willa Willa Everywhere / Party Animals!
programme.desc: Willa joins three clubs and realizes that all three activities are happening on the same day. / Willa wants to go to a party with the cool chicks.

programme.title: Kids Diana Show: Diana and Roma's Super Swirly Balloons! / Diana's Perfect Princess Day!

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles

programme.title: Dragonquest
programme.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet -- the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Hercules Reborn
programme.desc: When a young man's bride is kidnapped by an evil king, he turns to Hercules for help. The fallen hero has been living in exile, banished for killing his family, but the young man's courage inspires Hercules. Together, they fight to rescue the bride and reclaim Hercules' honor.

programme.title: Jane White is Sick and Twisted
programme.desc: Jane White (Kim Little) is a disturbed young woman living in her own bizarre TV fantasy land. For Jane, life itself is a television program, and she dreams of becoming a star on the small screen. Convincing herself that Gerry King (David L. Lander), a popular talk show host, is her birth father, she sets out on an adventurous road trip -- aided by her equally looney boyfriend, Dick (Wil Wheaton) -- to confront her "father" on the air, and, just maybe, make a splash on reality television.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: Strange things are afoot in the depths of the sea. First a passenger plane vanishes over the Pacific Ocean. Then an oil platform is obliterated. Marine biologist Emma MacNeil (Deborah Gibson) is dispatched to investigate the phenomena, and, with the help of Japanese scientist Seiji Shimada (Vic Chao), she makes a discovery that will rock the world: An enormous prehistoric shark and a giant octopus have been awakened from their icy slumbers -- and they're hungry.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E9 | The Liberty Bell
programme.desc: We explore the stories of how a 14-year-old farm boy invented television and went to court to prove it, as well as how the Liberty Bell came to develop its crack.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E10 | Turkey Tracks
programme.desc: We explore a Connecticut town that claims to have dinosaur tracks, a museum of smugglers and their methods of smuggling, and the story of an artist who uses all types of wood to make his dream home.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E11 | The Brookdale Inn
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a small town named after a sports star who had never been to it, and a British couple who strive to recreate the 1940s in their home life.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E12 | The Underground Orchard
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a man who built an underground home and farm, a group of stone animals carved by an unknown artist, and the story of a flood of biblical proportions.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E4 | American Midnight
programme.desc: In a small Arkansas town, two young men are found dead on the train tracks. Upon investigation, it becomes unclear whether they were hit by the train, or were the operators of a major drug ring.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E6 | Heavy Watergate: The War Against Cold Fusion
programme.desc: In 1989, two respected chemists made an announcement that rocked the world of science. Their experiments with heavy water yielded enormous amounts of heat energy, now known as cold fusion.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E7 | Noah's Ark Found?
programme.desc: In 1960, a joint US-Turkish expedition sets out to investigate the aerial sighting of a boat-shaped object located in eastern Turkey. Could this be the mortal remains of the legendary Noah's Ark?

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S2 E4 | Utah Fireball
programme.desc: When hundreds of people witness a spectacular night time fireball over Salt Lake City, Steve and Geoff drop everything and race to Utah. After days of searching and communicating with their Doppler radar expert, Rob Matson, the guys conclude that any surviving meteorites must have landed on top secret military property that includes Utah Test and Training Range (under Air Force control) and Dugway Proving Grounds (under Army control).

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S2 E5 | Wisconsin Fireball
programme.desc: The guys are on their way to the Northeast Astronomy Forum in New York for a personal appearance, when a large fireball is seen over rural Wisconsin. Geoff continues on to NEAF to hold down the fort, while Steve begins an all-night drive to the fall site.

programme.title: Meteorite Men, S2 E6 | Sweden
programme.desc: Geoff and Steve cross the Arctic Circle and head north on one of their most daring expeditions yet. With the help of a brilliant Swedish meteorite-hunting family the guys will attempt to uncover ancient space rocks that were transported by glaciers during the last Ice Age, and which have remained hidden and buried for 60,000 years.

programme.title: Urban Legends, S2 E8 | Bad Sports
programme.desc: Can you spot the true story? A hockey hero’s fishing expedition ends up costing his team dearly an advertising exec goes for a jog and gets more than he bargained for and, a wrongly imprisoned aid worker puts his time behind bars to good use.

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fury
programme.desc: The key to earth's salvation lies within 10-star fragments that give the Legendary Bladers the right to fight on their chosen side Gingka - he is one of these Legendary Bladers!
