programme.title: Chokeslam
programme.desc: A deli clerk gets a second chance to woo his high school sweetheart, a famous female professional wrestler.

programme.title: Theatre Macabre EP03 - The Tortures of Hope
programme.desc: Christopher Lee hosts this anthology series adapted from stories by Poe, Dostoevsky, Robert Louis Stevenson and Oscar Wilde.

programme.title: Sea Fog
programme.desc: A cash-strapped Korean sea captain and his crew agree to smuggle Chinese immigrants into the country.

programme.title: No One Heard The Scream
programme.desc: A high-class escort witnesses her new neighbor trying to dispose of his wife's corpse.

programme.title: Space Mutiny
programme.desc: A pilot is the only hope to stop the mutiny of a spacecraft by its security crew.

programme.title: Challenge The Devil
programme.desc: A group of dropouts find an old man in a castle who turns into the Devil and seizes them.

programme.title: The Secret Lives of Dorks
programme.desc: When cheerleader Carrie realizes that dorky Payton's crush is likely to last 'til middle age, she sets him up with a dorkette from school. Sadly, Payton is a dating disaster area.

programme.title: The Babymoon
programme.desc: In a fragile relationship, a husband tries to impress his pregnant wife with a luxurious babymoon vacation to the most beautiful and exotic country on the planet - Which unbeknownst to him is currently undergoing a political revolution!

programme.title: Black Beauty
programme.desc: A father allows his daughter to spend the summer with her grandfather rehabilitating an injured horse, and they learn that love and trust can heal anything.

programme.title: The Posthuman Project
programme.desc: Five high school friends are about to graduate from the human race.

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke and Emma Watson star in this thriller about a crime in a small town that unmasks a horrifying nationwide mystery.

programme.title: The High and the Mighty
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Dan Roman, a veteran pilot haunted by a tragic past. Now relegated to second-incommand cockpit assignments, he finds himself scheduled on a routine Honolulu-to-San Francisco flight – one that takes a terrifying turn.

programme.title: Easy Come, Easy Go
programme.desc: On his last day in the Navy, frogman Elvis discovers a sunken treasure ship. On his first day as a civilian, Elvis starts his new job—self-employed treasure hunter!

programme.title: The Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Bogart plays an escaped con who has nothing to lose. March is a suburban Everyman who has everything to lose - his family is held hostage by Bogart.

programme.title: Roustabout
programme.desc: Elvis is a karate-chopping biker who’s hired as a carnival Roustabout. At first, he just provides muscle and a diversion for the beautiful carny girls. Then he picks up a guitar and gets the midway rockin’.

programme.title: The Return of the Native
programme.desc: Tumultuous romantic entanglements of Eustacia Vye and the two men in her life, set in England's Egdon Heaths. Stars Clive Owen, Catherine Zeta Jones and Ray Stevenson. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: The Magic of Ordinary Days
programme.desc: Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

programme.title: After All These Years
programme.desc: When a woman is wrongly accused of the death of her ex-husband, she sets out to solve the murder mystery and find the real killer before the day of the funeral, when she is to be taken into custody.

programme.title: Brush With Fate
programme.desc: A teacher regales a new colleague with tales of a Vermeer painting's impact on the lives of its past and present owners. Stars Glenn Close, Ellen Burstyn.

programme.title: Be My Valentine
programme.desc: Daniel Farrell is a young widowed father who is navigating mourning and parenting an adolescent son. While teaching his son the ropes on dating, Daniel discovers he too has many things to figure out about love.

programme.title: Tracks
programme.desc: The true story of a young woman who leaves her urban life to trek through the sprawling Australian desert.

programme.title: Dark Tide
programme.desc: A professional diver tutor returns to deep waters following an almost fatal encounter with a great white shark

programme.title: All Is Lost
programme.desc: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a sailor finds himself staring his mortality in the face.

programme.title: Tracks
programme.desc: The true story of a young woman who leaves her urban life to trek through the sprawling Australian desert.

programme.title: Retrograde
programme.desc: Two opposing time travelers are sent back to the present to prevent a global biological disaster from occurring.

programme.title: The Cold Equations
programme.desc: A space mission is jeopardized when a stowaway adds too much weight to the spacecraft and the captain has to decide what weight must be jettisoned.

programme.title: Flowers for Algernon
programme.desc: Charlie Gordon (Matthew Modine) is mentally handicapped but wants to be a genius. When a laboratory experiment raises his IQ to amazing levels, Charlie must emotionally adjust to his new abilities.

programme.title: Steel Frontier
programme.desc: A story of a gunfighter who goes after a band of marauders that is terrorizing and killing indiscriminately.

programme.title: New Rose Hotel
programme.desc: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, so they decide to use a beautiful call girl to do so.

programme.title: Erik the Viking
programme.desc: A Monty Pythonesque farce about a Viking who grows dissatisfied with his barbaric way of life, and decides to set out to find the mythical Asgard--where the Norse gods dwell.

programme.title: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai
programme.desc: Buckaroo Banzai is a rock-star/brain-surgeon/comic-book-hero/samurai who along with his group, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil creatures from the 8th dimension (all named John) who are trying to conquer our dimension.

programme.title: Planet Hulk
programme.desc: Earth's mightiest heroes exiled him to outer space. Now the Incredible Hulk has crash-landed on a distant alien planet, ruled by the tyrannical Red King, and he must become the planet's mightiest gladiator if he wants to survive.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In this tense apocalyptic thriller, five youths fight to survive after being stranded in Moscow during an alien attack.

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: A young teenager camping in the woods helps rescue the President of the United States when Air Force One is shot down near his campsite.

programme.title: The Prisoner
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Jackie Chan ("Rush Hour") stars as an undercover police officer who infiltrates a deadly prison where a team of mercenaries is being assembled.

programme.title: American Warfighter
programme.desc: Rusty Wittenburg is a Navy SEAL struggling to balance his family life and his job. He fights daily to maintain the line between reality and the nightmares his PTSD conjures up for him.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: When a young basketball player becomes entangled with drug dealers, he turns to an ex-cop and former private eye. Starring Ice-T, Gary Busey, Fred Williamson and Jim Brown.

programme.title: Icetastrophe
programme.desc: A piece of a meteor strikes the center of a small mountain town and causes deadly freezing temperatures.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Jason Statham stars as a tough cop who's dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers. Also featuring Paddy Considine and Aidan Gillen.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 1
programme.desc: 'The Search'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 2
programme.desc: 'Family Secrets'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 3
programme.desc: 'Allele 26'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Unknown Male Number 1: Episode 4
programme.desc: 'The Trial'. A murder, a body and a single piece of unknown DNA, so begins the gripping story of one of the most ambitious forensic investigations ever undertaken in pursuit of the identity of the killer of a 13-year old near her home in northern Italy in 2010. This riveting four-part documentary series follows the 7 year saga of a tenacious and emotionally-invested lead prosecutor in her case as she seeks justice.

programme.title: Southwest of Salem
programme.desc: A modern version of the Salem witchcraft trials, this Emmy-nominated, Peabody-winning documentary follows the story of four Latina lesbians wrongfully convicted of gang-raping two little girls in San Antonio, Texas. Director Deborah S. Esquenazi transcends her role as a filmmaker, becoming an investigator alongside attorneys at The Innocence Project.

programme.title: A Cook's Tour: Highland Grub
programme.desc: Scotland: Beginning in Glasgow, Tony experiences the heart-clogging glory of deep-fried pizza, deep-fried mars bars, and deep-fried pickled eggs! Moving on to more traditional fare, Tony tastes haggis and learns to hunt and fish for his food.

programme.title: A Cook's Tour: Singapore: New York in Twenty Years
programme.desc: Tony sets out to find the real Singapore, with its multicultural restaurants and food markets. He samples prescription food dishes, explores the Geyland Serai Market, and rides the clean and efficient local subway.

programme.title: A Cook's Tour: The French Laundry Experience
programme.desc: Napa, CA: Marooned in San Francisco, Tony tastes local shellfish and durian ice cream before embarking on a pilgrimage to experience the genius of Thomas Keller, chef, and owner of The French Laundry.

programme.title: Meet the Patels
programme.desc: In this real-life "My Big Fat Greek Wedding,” an Indian-American man gets help from his parents and extended family so he can start looking for a wife the traditional Indian way.

programme.title: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Stacy is a freshman at a Historic Black College & University. She Meets and falls in love with a Grad Student named Benjamin. He's nice and charming at first. Until he starts to control her and physically, psychologically, and verbally abuse her. Can Stacy get out of this domestic violence relationship before it's too late?

programme.title: Do's and Don'ts of Dating
programme.desc: Ladies' man Scott Hall thinks he has the dating game figured out. He has dating rules that he follows until he meets his match. Will she throw him off his game?

programme.title: Stolen Lilies
programme.desc: Sandra Dennis, a social worker, whose daughter was a victim of human trafficking must race against the clock to find four girls trapped in a warehouse before they are shipped out of the country.

programme.title: Bachelorette's Degree
programme.desc: Bachelorette's Degree' is a steamy romantic comedy set in Washington, D.C., and explores the dynamics of love and friendship, tested by unexpected circumstances. The film stars three beautiful, successful women as they debunk the notion of women racing for the marriage altar. Instead, it tells the other side of the story. Dennie is a publicist for a national television personality. Jasmine has just finished law school and Kerra Carter is a seasoned middle school teacher. Join them on their hilarious, heart-touching journey.

programme.title: Don't Shoot
programme.desc: After the unarmed shooting of William King, a college bound black teen, by two white officers, a city is on fire as it seeks justice in these times of racial division.

programme.title: The Turnaround
programme.desc: The Turnaround is a story about a young guy named Marquise whose faith is challenged by the loss of both of his parents at an early age. He begins to drift towards street crime and away from his writing ambitions. A tragic event places him in a precarious position wherein he must choose between good and evil.

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Dinotopia, Ep. 3
programme.desc: Erik von Detten, Shiloh Strong, Michael Brandon, Georgina Rylance, Sophie Ward, Lisa Zane, Jonathan Hyde Castaways in time find themselves stranded on the shores of a prehistoric Eden where dinosaurs and humans co-exist in peace and harmony

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 1
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: Jules Verne's Mysterious Island, Ep. 2
programme.desc: Kyle MacLachlan, Patrick Stewart, Gabrielle Anwar, Omar Gooding, Jason Durr, Danielle Calvert, Roy Marsden Escaping from a Confederate prison camp by balloon, five survivors land on an uncharted island in the Pacific. Far from a sanctuary, the island is home to carnivorous monsters, bloodthirsty pirates, and the mad genius, Captain Nemo, who inhabits the mysterious island for his own strange ends.

programme.title: The Food Cure
programme.desc: Six advanced cancer patients make an unusual choice. They decide to face the disease with their forks. The patients embark on an arduous 7-year journey as they attempt to eat and juice their way back to health...with surprising results.

programme.title: The Body Fights Back
programme.desc: The Body Fights Back is a feature documentary about five people navigating the paradoxes of diet culture. While promises of happiness, desirability and perfection are irresistible, joy and contentment remain out of reach.

programme.title: Sustenance
programme.desc: A challenge by a group of friends with different diets takes the viewers on a global journey in search of the dimensions of sustainability.

programme.title: Stronger for Life
programme.desc: Follow an international fitness expert's inspiring journey from cancer to recovery proving her philosophy that physical exercise makes you stronger to face all of life's adversities

programme.title: Shred America
programme.desc: Four twenty-year-olds travel from Chicago to New York on skateboards. Fueled by youthful ignorance, the four navigate America's landscape through a maze of wrong turns and unfortunate circumstances.

programme.title: Overfed & Undernourished
programme.desc: Overfed & Undernourished examines a global epidemic and our modern lifestyles through one boy's inspiring and personal journey to regain his health from the inside out.

programme.title: The Taming Of The Shrew
programme.desc: A rambunctious version of Shakespeare's comedy about a rich merchant who has two daughters, one sweet, comely and shy and the other gorgeous but mean-tempered. The sweet-tempered daughter is being courted by several young men who are stunned when her father announces that she cannot marry until her sister does.

programme.title: My Sister Eileen
programme.desc: Upon arriving in New York's Greenwich Village, the blonde and beautiful Eileen Sherwood (Janet Leigh) looks for work as an actress while her sister Ruth (Betty Garrett) pursues a career as a writer. Pretending to be the man-chased heroine of her hilarious "My Sister Eileen" stories, Ruth attracts the attention of magazine editor Bob Baker (Jack Lemmon). And while being pursued by reporter Chick Clark (Tommy Rall), Eileen looks for work with the help of soda fountain manager Frank Lippincott (Bob Fosse). Hoping to get Eileen alone, Clark persuades Ruth into going with him to Brooklyn to cover the arrival of a Brazilian naval cadet training ship. But when Ruth returns home with the conga-dancing cadets in tow, the ensuing riot lands them all in jail. And as Bob is the one who finally admits his love for Ruth, it's Frank who proposes to Eileen.

programme.title: Pal Joey
programme.desc: An egotistical nightclub singer must choose between the wealthy socialite who can help his career and the chorus girl who's stolen his heart.

programme.title: The Ambushers
programme.desc: Agent Matt Helm is sent to discover the whereabouts of an experimental flying saucer which was brought down somewhere in Mexico and has to keep the saucer from falling into enemy hands.

programme.title: The People Across The Lake
programme.desc: A quiet community. A deadly secret. A courageous mother. A fight for their lives.

programme.title: The Principal
programme.desc: At the toughest high school in town, the biggest troublemaker is the principal. Edited for TV

programme.title: Agnes Of God
programme.desc: An analyst is sent to a convent to investigate the case of a young nun whose newborn baby is found strangled.

programme.title: Terror Among Us
programme.desc: A police sergeant and a parole officer endeavor to stop a rapist-on-parole before he can follow through his threats on five women whom testified against him years earlier.

programme.title: The People Across The Lake
programme.desc: A quiet community. A deadly secret. A courageous mother. A fight for their lives.

programme.title: 40 Guns To Apache Pass
programme.desc: A heroic cavalry captain singlehandedly puts down a massive Apache rebellion, led by Cochise, soon after the Civil War.

programme.title: The Black Dakotas
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a Rebel spy poses as a Yankee to steal gold the Sioux have promised to the Northerners.

programme.title: The Man From Colorado
programme.desc: A sadistic judge's lust for blood puts him at odds with his best friend in post-Civil War Colorado.

programme.title: Return Of The Durango Kid
programme.desc: The Durango Kid comes to Texas with the avowed intention of clearing the name of his father, who has been framed by some crooked politicians and slain.

programme.title: Jesse James Vs. The Daltons
programme.desc: A man sets out to learn if he is the son of outlaw Jesse James.

programme.title: Gunfighter
programme.desc: A classic western tale of hate, murder and revenge.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Yorke leads his cavalry troops to the Rio Grande to fight a warring tribe. Yorke’s toughest battle lies ahead when his unorthodox plan to outwit the elusive Apaches leads to possible court-martial.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass
programme.desc: As a train races through the Rocky Mountains, the passengers are being murdered! The only hope is John Deakin (Charles Bronson) who uncovers a secret that explodes in a torrent of shocking revelations, explosive brawls, and blazing gun battles.

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: Lt. Col. Yorke leads his cavalry troops to the Rio Grande to fight a warring tribe. Yorke’s toughest battle lies ahead when his unorthodox plan to outwit the elusive Apaches leads to possible court-martial.

programme.title: The Proposition
programme.desc: In this gritty Western written by acclaimed songwriter Nick Cave, a lawman (Guy Pearce) apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his girlfriend discover that an old hermit is very lonely. Old Tony invites them to lunch and lets them look for arrowheads on a remote part of his land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Lucas, Mark, and Micah get lost in Old Mexico, they are held hostage by a group of bandits who intend to kill the men and take Mark as a slave.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While trapped in the ghost town saloon, Lucas tries to come up with a plan to escape with his son and Micah after Mark refuses to leave without him.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: Hoppy and Red investigate a series of robberies where the bandits ride a short ways and then seem to disappear in thin air.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: A boy asks Hoppy to investigate the death of his father who was killed after being accused of cheating at cards.

programme.title: Hopalong Cassidy
programme.desc: Red is stricken with amnesia and believes that he is a Spanish nobleman. This complicates Hoppy's efforts to save a young woman's mine from swindlers.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A crooked businessman mistakes Pancho for the bandit he hired.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: After robbery in town, Papa rides into town holding shotgun and is mistaken for the bandit.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: To impress the woman he loves, a man buys a fire engine for his town. When he accidentally drenches her in water, she is not impressed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lou Mallory arrives in North Fork and starts buying up land and businesses. Lou and Lucas start disliking each other after she reveals plans to build a railroad on "worthless" land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When a woman arrives in North Fork with symptoms of smallpox, Lucas, Lou Mallory, Doctor Burrage and hotel occupants are quarantined in the hotel with an outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A man arrives in North Fork, intending to marry Lou Mallory. The hotel owner looks for a way out from marrying the man to whom her dying father promised her.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: Confederate veteran John Chandler (Alan Ladd) returns from defeat in war to find his home razed, his wife dead and his young son, David (David Ladd), traumatized and rendered mute. Desperate to cure the boy, Chandler takes David to a small town in Illinois where he hopes to find a doctor. But, soon after the pair arrives, Chandler finds himself framed for assault -- and forced to choose between serving hard time and working for struggling local farmer Linnett Moore (Olivia de Havilland).
